tool_description: An API that generates high quality quizzes based on a prompt.
name: Quiz GPT
title: Quiz GPT

api_list.name: generateQuiz
api_list.description: Generates a quiz based on a prompt. Can also return a quiz about a random topic.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quiz-gpt.p.rapidapi.com/api/generateQuiz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quiz-gpt.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
